item.title: Analysts Split On Trump's Push To Scrap Quarterly Earnings: 'A 90-Day Cycle Is Not How Business Operates,' Says Tom Lee
item.description: President Donald Trump's plan to scrap the quarterly earnings reporting requirement for public companies has sparked a sharp debate. read more

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard Defends Trump's Iran Strike: Cites Iraq War Lessons, Warning Against Simplistic Regime Change
item.description: Tulsi Gabbard defends President Trump's strike on Iran and warns against past regime change mistakes in the Middle East. read more

item.title: Tim Cook Says Apple Will Invest $600 Billion In US Manufacturing, Creating A 'Domino Effect' As iPhone 17 Pre-Orders Show Strong Momentum
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook said the company will invest $600 billion in U.S. manufacturing to boost 79 factories and spark a "domino effect." read more

item.title: Nasdaq Gains Over 200 Points Ahead Of Fed Meeting: Investor Sentiment Improves, Fear Index Moves To 'Greed' Zone
item.description: The CNN Fear & Greed index improved, Nasdaq gained 200 points, S&P 500 had its best week since August, Dow closed higher. read more

item.title: 'Daddy Is Very Much Home,' Says Elon Musk, Reiterating Commitment To Tesla Amid $1 Billion TSLA Stock Buy
item.description: Elon Musk shares busy schedule, reaffirms commitment to Tesla and his other ventures amid stock rally and $1 billion share purchase. read more
